links.title: BMW just unveiled a new electric SUV concept to take on Tesla's Model X - take a closer look | Markets Insider
links.description: BMW unveiled an electric concept SUV, the Vision iNEXT, on Saturday. The vehicle's features include autonomous driving technology, voice control, and a projector that can show images or videos on objects held by passengers. A production vehicle based on the concept is planned for 2021.

messages.body: $TSLA Hacker Steals Tesla Model 3 From Mall of America Using Only A Smartphone. https://www.zerohedge.com/news/2018-09-15/hacker-steals-tesla-model-3-mall-america-using-only-smartphone

links.title: Hacker Steals Tesla Model 3 From Mall of America Using Only A Smartphone
links.description: After several humiliating months for Elon Musk and Tesla, the company may have just set a new standard for embarrassing itself when one of its Model 3 vehicles was allegedly stolen from the Mall of America by a 21-year-old, using only his smartphone.

links.title: Tesla Increases Registered Capital Big Time For Gigafactory 3 In China
links.description: the registered capital of The Chinese Tesla factory in Shanghai announced this summer soon should move to the execution phase, as on September 7 Tesla increased Tesla (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. from 100 million yuan ($16.6 million) to 4.67 billion yuan ($680 million).

links.title: Is Tesla Still on My "Never Sell" List?
links.description: I'm a firm believer that the best way to make money in the markets is to buy great stocks and hold them indefinitely. However, it would be an enormous understatement to say that the last year has been challenging for the company.
